name: ROS-Waiter
body: ROS-Waiter ========== ## Introduction This App is part of the Restaurant Ordering System, and is designed to work alongside [Manager](http://dylanslewis.github.io/ROS-Manager/) and [Kitchen](http://dylanslewis.github.io/ROS-Kitchen/). ## Current functionality Waiter currently only has core functionality and is still in development. However, the current version provides the following functionality: ### Login Some text ### Order management Some text ### Ordering process Some text ### Discounts Some text ### Push notifications Some text ## Known issues The app has the following known issues. ## How to use If you want to download and explore the App, please use the following login credentials to view an account with pre-loaded data: username: *tester* password: *password* *Please note that Waiter has only been designed to work on an iPhone 6 running iOS 8, currently. It will run on other devices running iOS 8, but you may experience multiple layout issues.* ## Future work The Restaurant Ordering System is an ongoing project. Now that simple functionality has been implemented, the developer is working on enhancing the experience for Waiters, and to cover less common use cases.
